name: Twin Androids Demo
description:
A visual novel about a company and its products.

Created for my final major college project. 

Notes:

  • In Bolts' route, code is broken where she will give the same reply no matter how you respond to her question about the weather.

CHEAT SHEET

Having trouble figuring out the answers? Use this guide!

Notes: 

  • Responses must be exact. 
  • Interchangeable answers are contained in brackets.

Bolts Route:

  1.  Q: No need to alert me, I’m already aware of that – you’re not the first of your kind. / A: First of my kind?
  2.  Q:  We should be talking about you! How are you? / A: {Good} {Well} {Bad} {Sad}
  3.  Q: What was the weather like today? / A: {Sunny} {Warm} {Raining} {Cloudy}

Fritz Route:

  1. Q:  Maybe you're not as dull as the rest. / A: As dull as the rest?
  2.  Q:  Well, all except the one before you. / A: The one before me?
  3.  Q: It's why me and my sister were created in the first place. / A: Your sister?
